title: Textile, 1850s–70s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 201 x 57.5 cm (6 ft. 7 1/8 in. x 22 5/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 199.5 x 57.5 cm (6 ft. 6 9/16 in. x 22 5/8 in.)
Repeat H x W: 13.3 x 11.5 cm (5 1/4 x 4 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. William Randolph Hearst, Jr.
description: two lengths of cotton printed by engraved roller: small scale vine with tiny flowers in black, green and rust on a purple-gray backgroudn (the gray tone achieved by cross hatching.) Unit of straight repeat: 13.3 cm (5 1/4") high x 11.5 cm. (4 1/2") wide.

tombstone.epitaph:

1850s–70s. Medium: cotton
